name: YOFIO FINANCIAL HOLDING LLC
description: Developer of microcredit application designed for purchases at informal corner stores. The company's application scans QR codes to show the details of the products being bought and authorizes the purchase by notifying the store and provides credit facilities to corner stores through the app and in partnership with the store gives credit lines to the store customers, enabling customers to buy today and pay in a month.
